mapper.select: select count(*) from m_member_info where login_name = #{loginInfo.loginName} and password = #{loginInfo.password};
mapper.update: update m_member_info set login_time = now() where login_name = #{loginInfo.loginName} and password = #{loginInfo.password};
mapper.select: select id, login_name as loginName, contact_name as contactName, company as company, date_format(login_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as loginTime from moke.m_member_info where login_name = #{loginName} and password = #{password};
